{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17285v1", "title": "Some remarks on Liouville type theorems for the 3D steady tropical
  climate model", "summary": "Observing the special structure of the system and using the
Poincar{\'{e}}-Sobolev inequality, we establish Liouville type theorems for the
3D steady tropical climate model under certain conditions on $u$, $v$, $\nabla
\theta$. Our results extend and improve a Liouville type result of Cho-In-Yang
(arXiv:2312.17441).", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-24T06:26:50Z"}
